summary: This is an email chain from October 2019 regarding a subpoena tracker for financial records in the Epstein investigation. A forensic accountant from the FBI New York Field Office provides a summary of financial subpoenas served, and a request is made for copies of subpoenas issued to American Express and Deutsche Bank.

persons.name: Messke
persons.context: Receives email about subpoena tracker and requests copies of subpoenas issued to American Express and Deutsche Bank.

persons.name: Forensic Accountant FBI New York Field Office
persons.context: Serves financial subpoenas and provides a summary of them via email attachment for review.

events.title: Financial Subpoena Summary Provided
events.description: A forensic accountant from the FBI New York Field Office serves financial subpoenas and emails a summary of them for review.
personsInvolved: Forensic Accountant FBI New York Field Office

events.title: Request for Subpoena Copies
events.description: Messke requests copies of subpoenas issued to American Express and Deutsche Bank.

keyFacts: Financial subpoenas were served as part of the Epstein investigation, with a summary provided by an FBI forensic accountant.
Subpoenas were issued to American Express and Deutsche Bank for financial records.
The correspondence indicates active investigation into Epstein's financial activities in October 2019.
